page.title: 07A Day In Life Of N Paterson
page.content: The day started when I first opened my eyes at around 8.45am when I dress and go and have my breakfast which was a plateful of rice krispies a slice of toast, and a cup of tea. I then put on my boots and my jacket and went outside to find a dullish day. The first thing I noticed as I walked along the lawn was my Dad working with his brother on one of the fields in the distance. I opened the garage door to get my bike. I wheeledd it out my bike and shut the garage door again. I went on my bike and went down to my friends house. There were already playing football as I neared the house my friends saw me and took their bikes and came up the road together and went up ifto the farm. We didn't stay long at the farm because after half an hour of playing around at the farm it was time for
